example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VP (ADVP (CS 如果)) (VP (BA 把) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (NN 时间)) (VP (VV 耗) (PP-LOC (P 在) (LCP (NP (NP (NT 千禧) (NN 虫)) (NP (NN 堆))) (LC 里))))))) (PU ，) (VP (IP-TMP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 出) (QP-OBJ (CD 两) (CLP (M 年)))))) (VP (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 落伍) (AS 了))))))
